item.title: NV-305 North at I-80 - Battle Mountain
item.description: NV-305 North at I-80 in Battle Mountain. Turn right for I-80 East to Elko; continue over freeway for I-80 West to Winnemucca and for NV-305 North to Battle Mountain.

item.title: NV-305 North - Battle Mountain
item.description: Entering Battle Mountain on NV-305 North. Elevation 4505 Feet. Battle Mountain is the unincorporated county seat of Lander County.

item.title: NV-305 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-305 north. Distance to Battle Mountain.

item.title: NV-305 North - Austin
item.description: NV-305 North in Austin

item.title: NV-305 - Mile 0
item.description: NV-305 - Mile 0 Lander (LA) County

item.title: US-50 West at NV-305 North
item.description: US-50 west at NV-305 north to Battle Mountain. Continue west on US-50 for Fallon and Reno.

item.title: US-50 West at NV-305 North
item.description: US-50 West at NV-305 North in Austin.

item.title: US-50 East at NV-305 North
item.description: US-50 East at NV-305 north to Battle Mountain. Continue east on US-50 for Austin and Ely.

item.title: US-50 East Approaching NV-305 North
item.description: US-50 East approaching NV-305 North in Austin.

item.title: NV-305 - Mile 0
item.description: NV-305 - Mile 0 Lander (LA) County

item.title: End NV-305 South at US-50
item.description: End NV-305 south at US-50. Use US-50 West to Reno and Fallon; US-50 east to Austin and Ely.

item.description: NV-305 South at Silver Creek Junction

item.title: NV-305 South - Carico Lake Valley
item.description: NV-305 South at Carico Lake Valley junction

item.title: NV-305 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-305 south. Distance to Jct. US-50 and Austin.

item.title: NV-305 South - Battle Mountain
item.description: NV-305 South in Battle Mountain

item.title: BL-80 East/NV-304 East (Front St.) at NV-305 (Broad St.)
item.description: BL-80 East/NV-304 East (Front St.) at NV-305 (Broad St.) in Battle Mountain.

item.title: BL-80 East/NV-304 East at NV-305 South
item.description: BL-80 East/NV-304 East (Front St.) at NV-305 South (Broad St.) to Austin. Continue on BL-80/NV-304 for Elko.

item.title: End NV-305 North at BL-80/NV-304
item.description: End of NV-305 at BL-80/NV-304. Turn right on BL-80/NV-304 for Elko; turn left on BL-80/NV-304 for Winnemucca.

item.title: NV-305 North - Postmile 88
item.description: NV-305 North - Lander County Postmile 88

item.title: NV-305 North at I-80 West
item.description: NV-305 North at I-80 West in Battle Mountain.

item.title: NV-305 North at I-80 West
item.description: NV-305 North at I-80 West (Exit 231). Use I-80 west for Winnemucca. Continue north on NV-305 for Battle Mountain.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 231 Offramp at NV-305
item.description: I-80 East Exit 231 Offramp at NV-305 in Battle Mountain. Use NV-305 North for Battle Mountain; NV-305 South for Austin.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 231 - Use NV-305 For Austin
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 231. Use NV-305 South for Austin.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 231
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 231 - NV-305/Downtown Battle Mountain

item.title: I-80 East Exit 231 - Use NV-305 For Austin
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 231. Use NV-305 South for Austin.

item.description: US-50 shield at end of NV-305 south in Austin.

item.title: End NV-305 South at US-50
item.description: Directional sign to Ely, Austin, Reno, and Fallon at the southern terminus of NV-305 in Austin at US-50.

item.title: I-80 Exit 231 Offramp at NV-305
item.description: NV-305 at I-80 ramps to Battle Mountain, Elko, and Austin.

item.title: I-80 West Approaching Exit 231
item.description: Use Exit 231 for NV-305 south to Austin.

item.description: I-80 at Downtown Battle Mountain interchange in Battle Mountain.
